description: This file defines a React functional component called NotificationPanel, which displays a list of notifications with different styles and icons based on their type. It is part of the frontend UI components, specifically handling alert, info, and other notification messages.

methods.name: NotificationPanel({ notifications = [] })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a notification panel at the bottom of the screen, displaying notifications with different styles based on their type.

parameters.name: notifications
parameters.description: List of notification objects to display.
